It works GREAT!!

1- Install with setup
2-close Regcure and dont Update
3-Click Computer- C:Drive- Program Files- Regcure
4-Remove the Preinstalled Regcure file, File will just say Regcure with the picture icon.
5-Open up cracked folder and copy paste it into the Regcure folder in Program files.
